title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
The High Harper Type Companion Quest Act Act 3 Companion Jaheira Reward ???

The High Harper is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The High Harper can be acquired from Jaheira during the Act 3. Completing The High Harper will progress Jaheira story progression forward.

The High Harper Objectives

Meet the Harpers at Danthelon's Dancing Axe.

Jaheira asked us to go to Danthelon's Dancing Axe in Wyrm's Crossing, where her Harper contacts are waiting to report.

Meet the Harpers in the basement
